document.full_text: phillip garrido, accused of kidnapping and holding jaycee dugard captive for 18 years, pleaded not guilty after his wife's lawyer said the couple had confessed to the crimes.
document.title: surprise in kidnapping case: suspect pleads not guilty
lines_and_colors: phillip garrido, accused of kidnapping and holding jaycee dugard captive for 18 years, pleaded not guilty after his wife's lawyer said the couple had confessed to the crimes.
